headline: Flower by Edie Parker Announces Exclusive Partnership with Verano to Launch Cannabis Line in Florida with Campaign Starring Miami Native and Grammy-Nominated Rapper JT
summary: NEW YORK, NY, & CHICAGO, IL, Nov. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Edie Parker (the “Company”), a leading female founded, female operated lifestyle brand merging the worlds of fashion and cannabis, today announced an exclusive partnership with Verano Holdings Corp. (Cboe CA: VRNO) (OTCQX: VRNO) (“Verano”), one of the largest multi-state cannabis companies in the U.S., to launch Flower by Edie Parker’s premium cannabis products and design-forward accessories in Florida, including 0.5 Petal Puffer all
